summary:
Two handed weapons should be advanced and more powerful.

Do you want two handed weapons to be real fierce?
Here is the answer.
descriptionHtml:
I didn't think I would use CK tool and TES5Edit for modding.
Playing game, I almost choose two-handed weapons.
But in Skyrim, They are too slow and have weaker power than duel-wieldings.

Actually, Two-handed weapons weren't slow in the past.
So, I decided change things.
Despite of being not used to managing tools, editing Perks is easiest way to do.

All effects of vanilla perks maintained, new Power added.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Changes
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[ Deep wounds ]
-----------------------
I think this perk's name isn't nice compare to Skullcrusher, Limpsplitter.
So, name changed It's now Swordmaster.

Greatsword never been slow, Swordmaster don't use heavy and slow blade.
This perk now provide also that you can swing greatswords faster and faster.

Attacks are 10% / 20% / 30% faster now.
( Less improved - 10% / 15% / 20% )

[Limbsplitter]
-------------------
Battleaxe looks cool but terrible like demon.
It is executioner of battlefield.

This perk now makes Battleaxes most destructive weapon.

Attacks do 10% / 20% / 30% more damage.
( Less improved - 10% / 15% / 20% )

[Skullcrusher]
--------------------
Real nutcracker.
When you crack nuts, you should try to push it with power.

So, now. This perk make Warhammer great nutcracker.

Power attacks with warhammers now do 20% / 40% / 60% more damage.
( Less improved - 15% / 25% / 35% )

[Warmaster]
------------------
Backward powerattack sucks. but I don't have skill making animation, so I changed perk instead.
Each weapons now have each effects.
There are two versions.

[1]
Greatsword - Do 25% more power attack damage. ( Less improved - 15% )
Battleaxe - Have 15% critical hit chance ( Less improved - 10% )
Warhammer - Have 10% critical hit chance, 20% additional critical damage. ( Less improved - 10% / 10% )

[2]
Greatsword - Do 25% more power attack damage. ( Less improved - 15% )
Battleaxe - 15% faster. ( Less improved - 10% )
Warhammer - 15% faster. ( Less improved - 10% )

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compatibility
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Don't use with overhaul mod - Requiem, Skyre - and another two-handed perk enhancement mod.
That's all.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
History
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1.2 - DLC compatible. Dawnguard required absolutely.

1.0 - Only for Skyrim.esm

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I'm not skillful modder just noob and player, so It took nearly 6 hours to complete works for me.
But I think it is tested well.

If it works not as expected, let me know.
